side.title: BrainBlitz
side.label: Founder and Full-stack developer
side.desc: BrainBlitz is an online version of the classic party game Scattergories, designed to bring the fun and challenge of the original game to a digital platform. The game is aimed at providing an engaging, interactive experience for players of all ages, allowing them to play with friends and family from anywhere in the world.

side.title: SplashStats

side.desc: SplashStats presents a solution for swimmers of all levels. Dive into precision tracking and refine your techniques with unparalleled insights.
